amendment.description: To provide for outreach to members of the Armed Forces and their dependents on the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1334 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1334 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To provide for outreach to members of the Armed Forces and their dependents on the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1334 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1334 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh.
